TopicTitle: Here's Your Chance to Own a Piece of the Space Race

(for full article)

there is even a Saturn V Rocket Engine from the Apollo missions
WOW! I wish I had the money for all that stuff, except the used toothbrush and undergarments.

Moving this to the Space Lounge

I've got my eye on that license plate, personally. Either that or the cosmonaut camera. Now if only I had the money for either...

EDIT: Or the flight helmet. That one might actually be in my range.

You know... if I actually had a career, and money, instead of being poor and in college, I'd seriously consider buying that there engine...

like, totally seriously.

that isn't really that expensive at all, considering the price of the other things.

EDIT: oh it's an auction... it's already up a big higher, but still... not too bad.

EDIT EDIT:... buy the control panel and convert it into a KSP control panel... make the dials read correct, and run your missions only through IVA, and clip out the on-screen control panels

TOTAL IMMERSION.

Im in the same boat as you guys, the prices don't seem that bad at least for that engine or control panel! But im a broke full time college student so I need to get a car first haha
